title: Body of rabbi found in the UAE; three arrested
Live briefing: Director of one of last functioning hospitals in northern Gaza is injured
content: Hussam Abu Safiya said earlier that Kamal Adwan Hospital had been attacked seven times in a day. Also, the body of missing rabbi Zvi Kogan was found in the UAE.
summary: Hussam Abu Safiya said earlier that Kamal Adwan Hospital had been attacked seven times in a day. Also, the body of missing rabbi Zvi Kogan was found in the UAE.

title: In violent weekend, top E.U. diplomat pours cold water on Lebanon cease-fire
Missing rabbi found dead in UAE; Israel blames ‘antisemitic terror’
content: Rabbi Zvi Kogan, 28, was living in Abu Dhabi with his wife as a representative of the Chabad-Lubavitch movement.
summary: Rabbi Zvi Kogan, 28, was living in Abu Dhabi with his wife as a representative of the Chabad-Lubavitch movement.

title: Fighting in Lebanon intensifies around Israel’s deepest known advances
Director of northern Gaza’s Kamal Adwan Hospital wounded, official says
War fatigue deepens in Israel as deaths mount and fighting expands
War fatigue deepens in Israel as deaths mount and fighting expands
content: A growing number of Israeli reservists are choosing not to report for duty, putting further strain on an overextended military amid an ever-widening war.
summary: A growing number of Israeli reservists are choosing not to report for duty, putting further strain on an overextended military amid an ever-widening war.

title: Deadly Israeli strike in Beirut adds to fears the war is escalating
content: Saturday’s attack completely demolished a multistory building in a densely populated neighborhood. Israel did not say who the strike’s target was.
summary: Saturday’s attack completely demolished a multistory building in a densely populated neighborhood. Israel did not say who the strike’s target was.

title: Israel investigates disappearance of Chabad emissary
20 killed, dozens injured in massive strike on central Beirut
content: The target of the attack on the Basta area was not immediately clear. The Israel Defense Forces did not appear to have posted an evacuation order for that area beforehand.
summary: The target of the attack on the Basta area was not immediately clear. The Israel Defense Forces did not appear to have posted an evacuation order for that area beforehand.

title: Northern Gaza hospital attacked 7 times in one day, director says
Pete Hegseth’s Army unit in Iraq was rocked by a war-crimes case
content: Donald Trump’s defense secretary pick was not involved in the murder of detainees, but the formative experience influenced his advocacy for troops accused of war crimes.
summary: Donald Trump’s defense secretary pick was not involved in the murder of detainees, but the formative experience influenced his advocacy for troops accused of war crimes.

title: 4 Italian peacekeepers injured by rocket fire in south Lebanon, U.N. says
China looks to step into global vacuum as Trump vows to pull U.S. back
content: At the COP climate conference, China has been presenting itself as a stable and reliable global leader, seeking to draw a contrast ahead of a second Trump era.
summary: At the COP climate conference, China has been presenting itself as a stable and reliable global leader, seeking to draw a contrast ahead of a second Trump era.

title: Major explosion rocks central Beirut, leaving huge crater
content: At least four missiles hit a site in the Basta neighborhood, Lebanese state media and Reuters reported. The target of the strike was not immediately clear.
summary: At least four missiles hit a site in the Basta neighborhood, Lebanese state media and Reuters reported. The target of the strike was not immediately clear.

title: Israeli strikes kill 12 medical workers in Lebanon, including a Baalbek hospital director
